name: Inveon
description:
Inveon is a Fast 50 technology company that has been delivering e-commerce infrastructure software, m-commerce applications and digital growth management solutions since 2006.
Today, the total annual e-commerce volume generated by companies using Inveon solutions exceeded a total worth of $1 billion. Inveon platforms are used by more than 40 million shoppers in 11 countries.
In order to help companies achieve their e-commerce potential, Inveon provides:
inCommerce: Digital Commerce Platform
Mobular: App-Commerce platform
GrowthLab: Digital Growth Management Solutions
